description: Irish police detective Adrian Donohoe was shot dead during a robbery in County Louth in January 2013.
title: Garda Adrian Donohoe murder: Aaron Brady sentenced to life in prison
title_page: Garda Adrian Donohoe murder: Aaron Brady sentenced to life in prison - BBC News
maintext: "The quest for justice for Adrian will continue and we appeal to anyone, near or far, who has any information that may assist in this investigation to come forward and do the right thing," he said.
